title: Can i get this fixed?
body:
I normally don't have RP but for once I do, and I accidentally just spent my RP instead of IP on Katarina I haven't played any games or anything with her, so u know its not that I don't like her, plz help
I don't want to like refund Kat, I want her, just I wanted to spend IP on her instead of RP, is there any way you can give me the RP back and buy  her with my IP

replies.body: If this was truly a mistake, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I can't promise anything, but as long as she remains unused there might be something we can do.
